name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: This is my first year living at The Loop apartment complex, so far it has been a great experience. Both the Leasing Team and Maintenance have been super quick with getting questions and or maintenance requests answered/fixed. One of the main contacts for the leasing team has been Ana and she has gone above an beyond to make me feel welcome and valued as a tenant. Luis does such a good job and is super quick to help once maintenance requests are made. Overall, the community within The Loop apartment complex is great to be apart of and I'm super glad to be able to renew my lease and prolong my stay at The Loop.
owner_answer:
Rubi,

Thanks so much for sharing your experience with us and your 4 star review. Our team is happy to see you enjoyed visiting our community and we hope our staff made your decision to lease with us that much easier! We can't wait to hear from you again soon.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: The tour was informative and Ana was great at answering all questions we had.  Sadly, we were not able to see an “actual” apartment but were directed to the website for details about floor plans and pricing but having an actual suite to see while there would’ve been really helpful.  Ana seemed to be friendly and appreciated by the residents we encountered while touring the property which made it seem like she is a “good adult presence” for the students living there.  I would suggest working toward having a list of students’ units available with advanced tour notice so that prospective students can get a better idea of the finishes and furniture inside the suites.  Regarding the students’ privacy, I think there are many ways to provide incentives to the one or two units’ occupants that would make this an option for possible future residents.  The details of the living space are hard to get a feel for from a “floor plan” simulation on the website.
owner_answer:
Michele,

We are so appreciative of your 4 star review and for taking the time to share it with us. At The Loop, our goal is to provide residents with the highest quality experiences. We hope you have a great day!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Hi! When my roommates and I started looking for apartments, we chose the Loop because of its great location, and that it came furnished. However, what made us love living here and want to continue to live in this apartment complex, is the community that is built here. This includes the frequent community events that are held, or just seeing friendly staff that are here to help. For me Ana from the Leasing Team and Luis from maintenance have worked so hard not only to respond to any issues I had asap but they make sure that everybody living here feels welcomed and cared for.
owner_answer:
Hey Ally!

Thanks for sharing your The Loop experience with us — we are glad it was a positive one!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I went to ask some questions about my account and the leasing term 2024-25. Anna was friendly and helpful in answering our questions. The leasing process was so easy. We got the whole thing done there at the moment, and Anna was there to help us. The entire experience was so sweet, fun, and accessible. I loved it!!!
owner_answer:
Dear Riya,

Thank you for your positive feedback! Our goal is to continue to provide a great experience. We appreciate you and enjoy having you as a part of our community.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I love it here :). During move in week, we had a lot of fun events on the rooftop with free food and engaging activities to meet other residents. The apartments are really nice and very clean. I have the most beautiful suite in my opinion! I also love my roommates, and I'm extremely grateful, especially because I'm a first year. The staff is extremely friendly. Shoutout to Kaelen, the most personable girl I've ever met! Thank you to The Loop for making my freshman year great. 😊🩷
owner_answer:
Dear bella,

Thanks for being a part of The Loop! We can’t wait to share your positive feedback with the rest of the team. We hope to continue to provide you with a quality experience.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I’ve had a great experience at the loop! A current resident for 2 years now. The staff is always super responsive to any maintenance requests or questions that I may have. Any request I have gets responded to very quickly. The building always has a staff member out front in the lobby so it always feels secure. Definitely an upgrade from past experiences in IV.
owner_answer:
We are so grateful for your positive review, Sierrah!

We strive for everyone to have the same experience as you. We are so happy you call The Loop home! Thanks again!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Living at the loop was a disappointment. The microwave was broken when we got there. We submitted multiple maintenance requests to fix it yet it never got fixed and I’m guessing that will be taken out of my security deposit too. The contract said I would be getting my security deposit within 21 days of my lease ending and it’s been 30 and I still haven’t received it. One of the laundry machines did not work for nearly the entire year until they started doing tours for upcoming residents, also with how much we pay, the laundry should cost less or nothing at all. The elevator and wifi would stop working so often to the point where I would specifically do tests and homework elsewhere on rainy or windy days because I knew it wouldn’t work. The front desk workers were rarely at the desk and didn’t seem to take anything seriously. One of my packages got stolen because they weren’t doing their job and they never did anything about it. It’s completely overpriced and definitely not worth it.
owner_answer: We apologize for your negative experience with us at Copper Social. We hope to provide a better experience for all of our residents and would like to discuss any feedback as it helps us get better. Please reach out to us at leasing@theloopiv.com. Thank you!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text:
Lived here for just under a year. Although Cardinal Group management is less bad than some other Isla Vista property management companies, my overall impression was nonetheless awful. I’d summarize my experience here as unprofessional, taxing, and poorly staffed.

On the other hand, it looks pretty from the outside, and the location and view are unbeatable.   If those positives are worth it, just come with your expectations tempered.
owner_answer: Thank you for your feedback as it helps us get better. We are sorry for your negative experience and hope to provide a better experience to all of our residents. Please reach out to us at leasing@theloopiv.com. Thank you!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I loved my tour and felt like all my questions were answered and I had a good idea of the Loop experience by the end of the tour. My tour guide Kaelen was very helpful and welcoming. The Loop is a great apartment complex and I hope I get to live here.
owner_answer:
Hey Rachel!

Thank you for your 5 star review. We’re glad to hear that you’re enjoying your experience at The Loop and we love having you as part of our community!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: luis always helps when somethings wrong hes amazing!!! the the people that work here also also amazing as well! so many cool events and cool people. love the apartment set up as well :)
owner_answer:
Yasmin,

We’re happy that you’re happy! Thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review. We’re so thankful for The Loop residents like you.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: The staff is great!! Kaelen answered all my questions and gave a great tour. She greeted our entire group immediately after walking in and managed to multitask and give attention to all potential residents!
owner_answer:
Hey Quinn!

Thank you for your 5 star review. We’re glad to hear that you’re enjoying your experience at The Loop and we love having you as part of our community!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: My favorite part about Loop living is the responsive maitenance orders. Louis, the full time maitenance staff is quick and does a fantastic job around the complex and in my unit. Whenever I put in a work order, the problem is almost always fixed with 24 hours, even if it's something as little as a lightbulb going out that I can't reach. Louis puts his heart and soul into his work, and he makes the Loop apartments a comfortable and safe place to live in for a student living on their own for the first time.
owner_answer:
Allison, 

 There’s nothing better than hearing our The Loop residents’ positive feedback! Thanks for sharing your experience with us.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Just moved in and I love this place! Great staff and so close to the beach! The Loop is in walking distance from everywhere and has such great views! 10/10 recommend!
owner_answer: Thank you, Ali! We love hearing that you enjoy living with us, and we love that you are here at The Loop!!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: The Loop is one of the most overpriced apartment complexes in all of IV for what it’s worth. I think the Cardinal Group has done a terrible job with making sure staff has all the right resources to keep up with its flaws. All the equipment in the gym were rusted over or had cracks/chips in protective coating. Machines did not work due to ocean air exposure and corrosion. The elevator license is more than two years out dated and always broken yet the complex expects the world of their SINGLE handyman who has done all he can to maintain the building by himself to the best of their ability. I feel comfortable giving two stars because the staff has always been nothing but helpful and flexible with all matters at all times. That being said, major renovations are expected especially since rooms are stuffy, dusty, crammed, and small with no circulation or minimal amounts of windows. I’m glad they started with the laundry rooms since they were completely outdated and constantly broken. I hope the management continues to invest in this property since the potential is there. Additionally, having a parking spot should not be an additional $200 monthly add on when rent already ranges from $1,000-$1346.47+ a month.
owner_answer:
Hello, Sarah  We apologize for the inconvenience you may have experienced at our community. Your feedback has been shared with our team and we will address your issues as soon as possible. Thank you for sharing this with our team.

The Loop

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Overall great place to live. Perfect location for everything IV and UCSB. Access to bus system is in close proximity. Security is pretty sound compared to the houses in IV, and the fob system is pretty convenient. Some criticisms would be that the gym equipment is outdated, and needs to be replaced. Management is very kind and the maintenance guy does a great job.
owner_answer:
Tyler,

Thanks for the 4 stars! We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. Please let us know if we can do something to make your experience even better!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Jaali provided exceptional service and was super sweet and accommodating every step of the way in the leasing process! She made everything super easy and made sure that all my needs were met throughout. :)
owner_answer:
Dear Nick,

Thank you for your positive feedback! Our goal is to continue to provide a great experience. We appreciate you and enjoy having you as a part of our community.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: This apartment building itself is okay and better than most in Isla Vista. However, the roommate matching system is very problematic. You'll be assigned with a random person and have no way to resolve any issues. If things don't work out, there's nothing the management can do. My assigned roommate was horrible and I had no choice but to transfer my lease to somebody else. Worst of all, I didn't get my security deposit back as promised.
owner_answer:
Hello Benjamin,

We are so sorry that your roommate matching experience was not up to par. We would love to work with you to remedy any issues that you are experiencing as well as discuss any transfer options we may have available. Please contact our leasing team at leasing@theloopiv.com.

The Loop

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Loved the rooftop events and staff was friendly. Maintenance guy was very cool. The apartment itself is made of lower quality materials. For example peeling cabinets, cement flooring. Walls are very thin and no AC. Liked the furniture. My room came w a stand alone closet, a desk, a chair, and a bed. Room dividers are made w a 7ft wooden fence, 10ft ceilings. So there’s a bit of a gap. Overall I really liked this place. The location is great. I’ve heard of people getting their bikes stolen from the loop bike racks so maybe don’t leave it there. Free paddle boards to rent. Most students are SBCC. Not many bugs except the occasional spider and flies if you leave the door open too long. Rent increased substantially for next years renters.
owner_answer:
Thank you so much for your review, Natalie. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

The Loop

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text:
Take every positive review with a grain of salt, as they give residents gift cards for leaving reviews. The Loop is overpriced and management is awful and completely apathetic. I lived there for two years, and in that time we have dealt with multiple floods from floors above, resulting in our walls and ceiling being opened up multiple times and our items getting damaged. The elevator frequently breaks, and people have been stuck unable to open the doors. Theft is common, we have had clothing stolen from the laundry room multiple times, and even items off of our door decorations, and a friend of mine had his speaker stolen. When I reported the thefts, they said there was nothing they could do about the clothing, as there are no cameras in the laundry room, and that they couldn't tell us who stole our door decorations (EVEN THOUGH THEY KNEW WHO IT WAS) because they didn't want to start issues between residents. They forced a new tenant into our room during the pandemic, even though my roommate was high risk (this new tenant made it clear she was unwilling to follow covid protocol, and management upon learning this essentially told us the only thing we could do to prevent them from moving her in was to pay an extra $1420/month in addition to the combined $3000/month we were already paying).
I will say that Luis, who is in charge of maintenance, is awesome. He's friendly, and is quick to take care of maintenance requests. The roof is also great. Just don't move in expecting any kind of respect from management, because they make it abundantly clear that all they want is your money and they do not care about the resident's well-being. We have been lied to by the building's manager multiple times, and they very clearly try to take advantage of college kids who do not know better.
Other things to be aware of, parking spots are limited and go quickly, and cost $200/month, and do not fit longer cars. There is also a $200/month fee for pets. Laundry costs around $1.50 per wash and about the same per drying cycle, but count on at least one washing machine and one dryer being broken, and having to dry your clothes twice as the dryers are not very powerful.
owner_answer: Natalie, thank you for your feedback. It is our goal is to provide the best possible service and we are truly sorry that your experience was less than satisfactory.  Our team would be happy to speak with you and resolve the issues you are having. Please contact our Leasing Office at (805)328-5007 at your earliest convenience.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text:
After moving in to The Loop, I have had experiences with a drain of my shower in the Cali Suite being very slow, things weren't as clean as I had hoped as well. However, after speaking with the manager and Luis, it appears that they try to take comments very seriously and are very helpful when it comes to things that concern a resident. As this is my first time renting an apartment, the process seemed seemless and very easy to go through. The only complaint I have is I wished that many of the things in the apartment were fixed the moment you walk in. Also, they don't tell you about a couch that doesn't come with a partially furnished apartment so I am glad that Elizabeth took care of the request to have a couch in the apartment when I asked.

Thanks for taking care of me and the apartments in the building! I know its demanding, but it has to be done and I'm glad it's trying to be done.
owner_answer: Hi Anna, thank you for leaving this detailed feedback about your experience with The Loop. Thank you very much for sharing these comments. Let us know if there is anything else we can assist with!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Not one to leave reviews but had to after seeing the rooftop at this place. I toured 4 places in IV and this place sold me because of the view and the quality of my tour - manager walked by and introduced herself and asked about us which was actually really nice. Prices are reasonable when you look at everywhere else that offers housing but the location is better because you’re closer to campus, beach and you get better views from rooms.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: If I could give the Loop zero stars I would, living at the Loop was an absolutely horrible and scarring experience. I don't even know where to begin with all the things that went wrong... to start our door was broken right from the start of moving in and we reported it right away, the staff said no problem they can get it fixed within the next couple of days but didn't actually end up fixing the door until the week of moving out (almost a year later). With this door not being able to lock we had many creeps just walk right on into our place, one time being a homeless man coming into our place in the middle of the night and me waking up the next morning to him asleep on the ground right next to my bed. This places water heater and laundry machines would continuously break as well resulting in freezing cold showers weekly and no clean clothes. This apartment complex is a very dirty and unmaintained place to live especially considering the rent is so expensive just to live in a shoebox. Don't even bother paying extra for a parking spot too because someone will park in your spot anyways and the staff won't do anything about it.
owner_answer:
Hello Summer,

Thank you for providing this feedback to our team. We apologize that your experience was not one that is representative of what we want for our residents and we will ensure issues like this do not occur again. Thank you.

The Loop

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: My daughter just moved out after a 1-year lease.  The apartment itself was okay.  The bathroom floor was nasty and in my opinion they did a poor thing cleaning the apartment before we moved in.  There were numerous little things here and there but I figured it's not a new building so told my daughter to deal with them.  The worst experience was toward the end of the lease.  My daughter was in a triple loft with 2 other girls in an open space on the loft.  Both of these 2 girls sub-leased their bed spaces to others for the months of June and July.  One of them turned out to be a BOY.  I was shocked when I found out that The Loop knew and allowed that to happen.  Needless to say I moved my daughter out the day the boy moved in.  So my daughter didn't even lived there for 2 months while I was stuck paying for the rent.  If The Loop management is reading this,  I'd like to request refund for the 2 months that the boy was there.  Also, this boy decided that since my daughter moved out all the spaces belong to him.  So when we turned in the keys early July, the front desk girl couldn't even complete a final walk thru to check us out since there was junks all over my daughter's desk, bed and closet which all belong to the boy.  This whole situation is absolutely ridiculous and unacceptable.  I'd say get a place somewhere else if you can.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: The Loop was a tremendous place to live during my enrollment at UCSB. The employees are extremely nice, welcoming, and always willing to lend a helping hand for any questions or requests that I had. The sky deck really can't be compared to any other apartment complex in the area as it offers tremendous views of sunsets, the beach, and Isla Vista. The deck offers tables to eat, lounging chairs to study in, and a gym. If I were to attend UCSB for an extra year, I would have most definitely lived at The Loop again.
owner_answer: Thank you,Kyle! We love hearing that you enjoy living with us, and we love that you are here at The Loop!!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: The Loop is one of the best places to live in IV. The Building complex itself is very modern and cool. There's a Gym on the room with an awesome view of the ocean, it's a great place to relax or hangout. The building is very safe, you need a special key card to get into the building and your room. The hallways are usually quiet, the hallways are cool because each level has a different color/theme, which is unique.  All the workers here are very friendly and helpful, they always say hello when I pass in the lobby (Plus they play the best music in the lobby)  and sometimes give out food and gifts. Theres also a security guard on the weekends who is very friendly. Management is very helpful with everything. My apartment itself is really nice and clean, has kitchen appliances, storage space, and is spacious. Plus its right around all the food in IV and 5 min walk from the beach, enjoyed living here :)
owner_answer: Thank you, Lauren!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I really don't recommend living at The Loop. The pictures are a very misleading representation of what the apartments actually look like. The floor is scuffed concrete, and they don't clean anything before you move in. The apartment was just so uncomfortably dirty. The rent is also unreasonable and very overpriced. If you look elsewhere in Isla Vista, you'll realize that paying above $1000 for a triple, especially with the condition of the apartment, is not worth it at all. Furthermore, I had a terrible situation with my assigned roommates in both of the apartments I lived in (I moved out of the first one because I struggled with one of my roommates, only to end up in another awful situation). The Loop's cleanliness, rent, and roommate-matching need a lot of improvement.
owner_answer: Hello, we are sorry to hear The Loop did not meet your expectations. We strive to offer the best experience for our residents. We would be happy to discuss this with you in detail. If you can email info@theloopiv.com, that would be great

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: The staff here is always very polite and welcoming. I have found the complex to be very safe. The ladies at the front desk downstairs have been very sweet and helpful. They often have food or tables downstairs where they offer free sweets, clothing and gifts to residents. The security guard and maintenance man are both friendly and easy to talk to. There is a gym upstairs with dumbbells and a few elliptical machines that I rarely use, although the deck on the roof is a nice place to relax or read in the sun. Overall, I have very few complaints about my time here and they are limited to minor appliance malfunctions with the washing machine and dishwasher.
owner_answer: Thank you so much, Austin! We are continuing to be the best for our residents!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Beautiful skydeck that has been renovated and is so vibrant and spacious. Great space to not just hang out but study now that there are umbrellas - a favorite! Elizabeth in the office is always helpful and passionate about The Loop and the residents. This is a great space to live in the Isla Vista market as housing is so limited.
owner_answer: Hello, thank you so much for your review. We appreciate your feedback!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text:
The loop is unreasonably overpriced and still charges big fees for being a couple days behind payment. Their website is deceiving, the rooms look nothing alike in person. After I got here my room literally looked like a jail cell! The place was empty, with no lights, ugly concrete floors with skid marks (Totally unfurnished). They have NO parking for guests. The roof has a gym with ok dumbells and 2 rusty machines that were probably bought at a yard sale(Lame). The least they could do is put a couple hot tubs up there. They have plenty of space and money for it.

They also have stupid scan cards that occasionally don't work, so I've had to stand outside and wait for a roommate to get me plenty of times. And no one at the front desk ever pickups the phone, so don't even bother calling.

I would NOT recommend this place to anyone. There are plenty of inexpensive, honest, furnished and generally better places in IV and SB. DO NOT settle for this hole!
owner_answer: Ezana, I am sorry to hear this. We want all of our residents to enjoy their living experience at The Loop and I want to ensure that you are one of them. I would love to discuss this with you in person anytime. Please feel free to reach out to me at (805) 328-5007. Thanks Ezana.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text:
I have lived here for 9 months. I only have one good thing to say about this place: Louise you are the man!. Everything else is pretty awful. Its overpriced, they lie, they are intrusive.

They advertise double rooms as singles. They use a splintery wooden divider that goes 4 feet up to separate their 'rooms'. I didn't learn about this until I moved in because there are no pictures or even mention of this on their website.

The "exclusive rooftop gym" is a few free weights and elliptical. The roof is not exclusive. Tenants aren't allowed to throw parties, however management will rent the roof out to outside parties the majority of weekends. These parties blast loud music throughout the night, often enough to shake the floor of my 3rd floor apartment. Tenants are unable to use the Gym on these days.

The largest issue I have had by far is Privacy here. Every week or so, we will have a 24 hour notice form on our door. Usually tours scheduled for 9AM-10AM. During this time, management will let themselves into your house. They have even opened my roommates bedroom door unannounced, after letting themselves into the apartment at 9AM. These tours  are consistent, and if your apartment is messy they will point it out to you.

Don't let them fool you. They will say "This is the average price of the area" or "Theres nothing else left". Don't listen. Its not.

They also give gift cards when people write reviews. Probably why their rating has stayed so high over the past year. But its going to catch up eventually.
owner_answer: Thank you for the review. The Loop is under new management as of June 2018 and we are starting to make new changes and implement policies and procedures that are best for our residents. We have a brand new team managing the property and are striving to be efficient with resident issues, phone calls and unit walks. Moving forward, there will be a lot of changes that take place to cater to the residents needs and demands. Thank you

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I lived at the Loop for two years and I must say is one of the best places to live in Isla Vista. Really smooth management transition and I must say things changed for the best. Elizabeth and Deshani are extremely helpful and I really enjoy the resident/management relationship!!
owner_answer: Nestor, thank you for your review. We are grateful for residents like you!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I love living at this property. The apartments are gorgeous and really make me feel at home. The location is stellar; right near the university and the beach! The staff has been very friendly and has assisted me with all of my questions and concerns.
owner_answer: Hi Leah! Location is everything! We are so happy you are enjoying your stay with us and are happy with your living experience! Thank you for your review, Leah!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I would give less than a star but can't. The pictures are a very misleading representation of what the apartments actually look like. The floor is  concrete, and they don't clean anything before you move in. literally has glass everywhere when I first moved in. They just want your money. They barely answer your calls. But when they do, you get nowhere. They said I could be a payment plan at first then when i call again they said nope we cant do anything for you. Over priced and rooming assignments need to change.
owner_answer: NFG, thank you for your feedback. It is our goal is to provide the best possible service and we are truly sorry that your experience was less than satisfactory.  Our team would be happy to speak with you and resolve the issues you are having. Please contact our Leasing Office  at (805)328-5007 at your earliest convenience.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I love the Loop! The staff is so friendly and always helpful, and all tenants get to use the free rooftop gym overlooking the ocean. 10/10 would recommend (:
owner_answer: Jazlyn, thank you for leaving this detailed feedback about your experience with The Loop. Thank you very much for sharing these comments.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I loved living here. I was in one of the least expensive rooms, (still over $900 a month) but my apartment had a great view. From my side of the building you could see the whole mountain range and it looked right onto the street or "the loop" where everyone walks by. It got pretty loud on weekend nights but it was very entertaining to people watch. The management is very responsive and friendly, and the building is very safe since you need a key card to scan in multiple times. The building is modern and fairly updated and the roof is awesome.There are nice laundry rooms on both the 2nd and 3rd floors but they are a bit pricy. There isn't A/C but there isn't anywhere else in isla vista either. Your apartment will come furnished with desks and chairs, twin beds and dressers. The downside of the place is that you will be paying a lot for a small shared space. You can easily find large single rooms in isla vista for less than you would be paying here, however the The Loop is right in the heart of town where all the food and stores are, and you will be a walking distance from all of them which comes in handy. Unless you can afford the parking garage I recommend finding parking on the street. The bus stop is about a ten minute walk from the building which isn't bad.
owner_answer: Thank you Sydney! Great information! We are happy you liked it!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Clean, modern appliances, maintenance requests and front desk helpful.
owner_answer:
PETER,

Thanks for the 5 stars! We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. Please let us know if we can do something to make your experience even better!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text:
The new manager is really great! She talks to me whenever she sees me and is super nice and always helpful when I have questions! I had a maintence request and it was completed almost within an hour. I really appreciated the quick service!!
The free food at the resident events is a bonus!!
owner_answer: Hi Sarat! We are pleased that you are enjoying your stay at The Loop! We are working diligently to ensure that all requests and work orders are taken care of in a timely manner. Happy to have you at The Loop with us!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Water undrinkable. Delivery service =$80 month.  Tiny washer/dryer combo-10 hrs per load= $100 electric bill p.p. No Ice maker & mini fridges except suite.  No Courtesy Officer as advertised to manage noise or lobby delivery thefts.  Dirty upon movein TV cables missing.  Harassment inspections & meetings request to coerce & intimidate unenforceable, non expense, frivolous & excessive ($500 per tenant) civil noise fines in attempt to subsidize low occupancy & profit, Misapply our $1,600 pp rents towards & continues to assess excessive daily $10 late fees.  We explicitly do not consent to entry & any further attempt to do so constitutes trespass under penal code 602.5 & 602.8 which is subject up to $10k in damages per tenant as well as harassment fines under civil code 789.3 as Isla Vista Foot Patrol weekly log confirms no noise complaints.
owner_answer: William, thank you for your feedback. It is our goal is to provide the best possible service and we are truly sorry that your experience was less than satisfactory.  Our team would be happy to speak with you and resolve the issues you are having. Please contact our Leasing Office at (805)328-5007 at your earliest convenience.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text:
They stole over $4,000 from me and put me in an unfurnished room and still charged me for a furnished room. Also charged me for the pet fee even when I only stayed in that one room divided into 4 "rooms" for 2 days and never brought my dog. Worst apartment ever.

For $1750 per month you'd expect in your "private room" a wall that makes it private from your roommate's room. No lights in the "rooms". To turn on the fan, you need a PIN or PAPERCLIP to press the button. Why? Simply because. Just because. No air-conditioning or ventilation. Which is against the law where I'm from.

Found a place in Santa Barbara for $1200 per month with a much bigger PRIVATE room, great private bathroom, much easier private parking, ALL utilities included and furnished! Keep searching, you'll find a better place that is worth the money! (Try Century Butler Realty in Santa Barbara)

UPDATE: After fighting for a refund, the manager said "You wouldn't bother going through the trouble of a legal battle to get your money back" which I proved otherwise. After filing a lawsuit, the owner contacted me and begged that I drop it if he gives me a full refund for the $4,000 + the $1,750 (pet fee included). Do NOT let them bully you. Someone should report this place.
owner_answer: Levi, we are sorry to hear this! The Loop is under new management as of June 2018 and we are starting to make new changes and implement policies and procedures that are best for our residents. We have a brand new team managing the property and are striving to be efficient with resident issues, phone calls and unit walks. We want to address residents, complaints, and concerns in a timely and organized manner moving forward. Thank you.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Friendly enviroment, quick response to maintenance problems. Great staff who is really helpful and around moat of the time. Apartments are modern, in the heart of IV, and offer a amenities such as a gym and a firepit. I would recommend living here, prices are high, but there's a variety of different floor plans for all price ranges and there's deals all the time. Very happy here!
owner_answer: Thanks you Ana! We strive to be the best in IV!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Great location, safe, and any issues concerning maintance are resolved in a reasonable time. As an over protected parent, I feel comfort in knowing my daughter is greatly protected with locked doors and elevators. Thank you staff for creating a comfortable enviroment for our children.
owner_answer: Hey Luis! We are so happy to have your daughter be a part of The Loop. Thank you for your review!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Deshani and the staff at The Loop took care of me in such a professional manner I couldn’t believe it. My son was taken care of with his move there and he felt welcomed and at home the entire time he has been there. Thank you guys for your professionalism and I will continue to refer people in your direction.
owner_answer: Mr. Tanzie, thank you for your review! We are happy to accomodate you and your son. We appreciate your honest feedback and generosity!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: The Loop has drastically changed after new management. I’ve had some issues and they have been taken care of immediately unlike before. It really is a beautiful place to stay as a student.
owner_answer: Jesus, thank you! We are so glad you are living at The Loop and we always want to make this experience better for you. Please let us know if there's anything else we can assist you with. Thank you!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: If I could give them 0 stars I would. CAUTION, if you are sending your children to live here be forewarned. The entire property is set up to deceive you with costs, services, and is managed and run by a group of immature, unprofessional snots. Try calling at any given time of the day, you will get an answering machine. No calls back. they will readjust rates and add additional costs to the bill that were not there to begin with. the security is sub par and there is constant instances of deception and illegal entrance to the rooms by the staff.
owner_answer: Chris, we are sorry to hear this. The Loop is under new management as of June 2018 and we are starting to make new changes and implement policies and procedures that are best for our residents. We have a brand new team managing the property and are striving to be efficient with resident issues, phone calls and unit walks. Thank you.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: The loop is a very warming and welcoming place. The people who work there are very professional. The best part about the loop, is that it's secure. Everyone is so nice and friendly. To be honest, if I could stay here again, I would
owner_answer: Thank you Shane!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I signed a lease for Fall 2021, I have experienced great customer service and very fast responses with all communication I’ve had so far with management. The proximity to campus and individual leases they offer are some of the best in IV off campus housing

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text:
$1,600 for 8x10 furnished w/tiny all in one washing/drying machine.
Despite multiple request, when I was the only occupant in the 6 person unit  to move to the window room, they refused.  Illegal lease w/ unenforceable CIVIL, (not tenant) noise fees $500 pp which they apply rent pay to making rent late so they can attempt to collect daily late fees for the entire year!  Don't pay them per Isla Vista Tenant Union.   Weekly inspection harassment to subsidize low over priced occupancy and attempt to intimidate and profit off of inexperienced transient youth w/ endless & excessive fees that Carlos at ICON apt has confirmed they have never once issued!
owner_answer: Thank you William for your honest feedback. We strive for the best customer service and apologize we did not meet the expectation. We’d love to make this up to you and discuss your concerns in person to assure they are taken care of correctly. Please contact us at (805)328-5007 or stop by the leasing office and ask to speak with our community manager.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: please go to The Loop Isla Vista to see the real yelp reviews of this place, the owner obviously when and changed the yelp site to The Loop Coastal Ridge. I know for a fact all of the review on that site are for Isla Vista and very accurate. This place is awful and sooo shady. Please, do your homework and visit Coastridge site for the real scoop!!
owner_answer: Thank you Cam for your honest feedback. The Loop is now under new management and unfortunately the old Yelp page was deactivated in transition. This was not intentional and we apologize if it seemed that way. At The Loop, we strive for the best customer service and apologize we did not meet the expectation. We’d love to make this up to you and discuss your concerns in person to assure they are taken care of correctly. Please contact us at 805.328.5007 or stop by the leasing office. Thank you.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: As a UCSB father I feel extremely comfortable with my daughter living at the Loop as it is one of the safest places in Isla Vista and fast responses to any issues and concerns from management.
owner_answer: Mr. Smith, thank you for leaving this detailed feedback about your daughter's experience with The Loop. !

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: The Loop has the best OCEAN views. Once you walk out of the elevator you are Hit with the best view in IV and the sunsets are the best with the fire pit on chilly night.
owner_answer: Thank you for the kind words! We love hearing that you enjoyed your experience at The Loop .

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: The Loop is pricy, and a tight space to live. If you are willing to put up with that, then it is a well maintained place. It has a great rooftop deck
owner_answer: Thank you John! We have beautiful amenities and a great community!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I've lived here for 3 years and overall I've had a good experience. The staff are super friendly and work hard to resolve issues as quickly as possible (shout out to Luis for all the quick maintenance repairs).
owner_answer: Thank you, Danielle! We love hearing that you enjoy living with us, and we love that you are here at The Loop!!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: lived here my freshman year of college and i wish i lived anywhere else. rent is too expensive for how small the rooms are and the manager is a total ass. he doesn’t care about anyone or your problems. also this place has a cockroach problem. nasty
owner_answer: Hi Katy, I am sorry to hear this. The Loop is under new management as of mid June 2018 with a new team and procedures, and we are doing our best to make The Loop the best living experience for all our residents!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Do not live here. This place tries every way possible to rip you off and make you pay as much money as possible for no reason. This is my first apartment I have ever lived in and it was a horrible experience due to the awful managment. It is very over priced and I DO NOT RECOMEND living here if you have other opitons
owner_answer: Lauren, I am sorry to hear this. When you have time, please reach out to info@theloopiv.com to set up a time to discuss this matter. We want to ensure that this is taken care of immediately.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: A lovely building with a beautiful view.  I choose this place because it is down the street from campus also, the building is safe the only way to enter the building and have access to all floors is by key card.
owner_answer: Thank you Thelma!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Absolutely loved living here! The loop is beautiful all around with its wholesome people and stellar views. The heart of IV if anything <3
owner_answer: Thank you Cynthia, we appreciate your feedback! We loved having you here!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Great views and it's super close to the beach. The apartments could be a bit more furnished though (there are no lights provided).
owner_answer: Thank you, Amanda! We appreciate your review.

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Very great place and super friendly staff! I ended up moving somewhere else because they did not have the floor plan I wanted, but overall loved the place and the nice staff.
owner_answer: Lauren, thank you so much for your review. We appreciate your feedback and would love to have you as a resident in the near future!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Love living here! Such an amazing place with great views! The manager is really amazing and super helpful, thank you for all of your help Deshani!
owner_answer: Jen, we are so grateful for your review. Thank you for the kind words and the feeling is mutual!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Enjoyed staying at the LOOP. I really like the locked doors and elevators bc I feel a bit safer. Also, they are very pet friendly!
owner_answer: Thank you, Jesusa! We want our residents to truly enjoy their home!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: This place is seriously the best. Sitting out on the Skydeck and taking in the 360 views of the beach is worth it and they have the most friendly staff!
owner_answer: Andrew, thank you so much for your review. We are so happy to hear this and we are grateful to have you with us!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I love living here because I have had a great experience due to the location and safety that The Loop has to offer!
owner_answer: Thank you Sierra! We are blocks from the beach and UCSB and we are a gated property to ensure the best security!

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Great place to rent for a student as the place has social events, building security and gym.
owner_answer:
Hello Lyubov! Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We strive for everyone to have the same experience as you! If you need anything, let us know. We appreciate you!

The Loop

review_text: The Loop has to be one of THE BEST living experiences in IV! Loved my time there!

review_text: Overall nice place people are friendly, a lot of things tend to break here but I rarely got texted about packages. Good place

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: I love the loop. The rooms are nice and the view is great :)

review_text:

name: The Loop Apartments
review_text: Great place to live! Everyone who works here is so helpful and being so close to the beach is awesome!

review_text: Stunning views and amenities !  Great customer service and fast response from management ! Highly recommend leasing here .
